channel.title: Misc on Naim's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on Naim's Blog

item.title: Host Your Website on GitHub with Hugo: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: Today I’ve gone through lot’s of pain to build my website (again) using Hugo for the 3rd time. üôÇ So I’m now documenting my process so that I can redo these in the future smoothly. Prerequisite Link to heading I’m assuming you already know how to work with github for my own convenience. If you don’t, there are lots of great blogs and youtube videos just one google search away!

item.title: Hello World
item.description: As-salamu alaykum wa-rahmatu-llahi wa-barakatuh. This is my first blog. I’ll post here about my learning and thoughts. Hope you’ll find something useful here! üòÑ See you again friend. ‚ù§Ô∏è
